text: Miguel de la Madrid Hurtado (; August 12, 1934 â€“ April 1, 2012) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI). He served as the 52nd President of Mexico from 1982 to 1988. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography by CIDOB (in Spanish) Category:1934 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from COPD Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Presidents of Mexico Category:People from Colima Category:National Autonomous University of Mexico alumni Category:20th-century presidents of Mexico
